title: Monday!
author: JGray
text:
Hidden Name: Glen

It has been an amazingly crazy week. Lots going on here at home. Not all of it positive. I'm not going to whine, though. Just going to apologize for being a little not here right now. I'll see you all on Thursday.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text:
No problem, we know how things can happen.

And yes, the giant Frankenstein stitches are a glaring design weakness of Flesh Golems.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Yeah, that's a clear weakness. They might be vulnerable to fire as well, zombies usually are.
